content:
A selection of three defining articles read aloud from the latest issue of The Economist

A SELECTION of three essential articles read aloud from the latest issue of The Economist. This week, Britain’s constitutional time-bomb . Brexit is already a political crisis—sooner or later it will become a constitutional one too. Also, how floods and storms in the Midwest are altering American attitudes to climate change (9:24). And, 30 years after the Tiananmen Square massacre , many Chinese know little about the bloodshed (18:07). Runtime: 26 min

Listen on: Apple Podcasts  |  Spotify  |  Google  |  Stitcher  |  TuneIn

ex: n. 执行时间，运行时间

wp.runtime environment: 运行环境;运行时环境;行环境;环境
wp.runtime error: 运行时出错;运行时错误;运行时间错误;运转时出错
wp.Common Runtime: 公共运行时;语言和通用运行时;公共运行环境;运行库
wp.Runtime Database: 运行时数据库;运行数据库;分布式动态数据库
wp.runtime host: 运行时主机;执行阶段主机;库宿主
wp.Reports Runtime: 不指定报表名而打开;报表运行器

ex: n. 〔机〕缝针；拼逢机；钉箱机；齿形压滚
网络 带材缝合机；钉书机；订书机

eg2: But is all this worth the ?
但是为了这一切，就值得流血吗？
He says an investigation into allegations of vote rigging should go forward without further .
他说，流血应该立即停止，应该开始调查有关选举舞弊的指称。
Everyone expects the  on all sides to increase, and that includes the civilians caught in the middle.
每个人都预测到各方的流血会增加，这也包括身陷交战两方中间的平民。

wp.Essential Information: 重要信息;		基本信息;基本资料
wp.essential water: 组成水;组成水份;必需水
wp.Essential hypertension: 原发性高血压;高血压;高血压病;特发性高血压
wp.essential balm: 清凉油;风油精;牌风油精;清凉油及薄荷膏
wp.essential patent: 必要专利;基本专利;必要性专利;标准之必要专利
wp.Essential Criteria: 基本素质;基本准则;基本标准;各原则对应的必要标准
wp.essential mineral: 知矿物;基本矿物;主成份矿物;主要矿物
wp.essential thrombocythemia: 原发性血小板增多症;多症;血小板过多症

ex: adj. 基本的；必要的；本质的；精华的
n. 本质；要素；要点；必需品
eg2: We see this as  for the success of any development effort.
我们把这看作是任何开发工作成功的必要因素。
Thus, an essential assumption of this method is that requirements must be well understood before development can go forward.
因而，这种方法的一个必要假定是需求必须在开发能够进行之前被充分地理解。
The essential sections of this article guide you through these steps for setting up distributed testing by installing software on the client machines.
本文的本质内容是指导您通过在客户端机器上安装软件，完成这些步骤来设置分布式的测试。

ex: n. 屠杀；残杀；（运动或比赛中的）惨败
v. 屠杀；杀戮；（在运动或比赛中）使惨败
网络 大屠杀；惨案；大规模屠杀
eg2: the bloody massacre of innocent civilians
对无辜平民的血腥屠杀
The game was a 10–0 massacre for our team.
这场比赛我们队以 0:10 惨败。

Title: Britain's constitutional time-bomb, extreme weather in the Midwest and 30 years since Tiananmen
